## RCrawler


```{r RCrawler}
library(httr)
url <- "http://ecshweb.pchome.com.tw/search/v3.3/all/results?q=sony&page=1&sort=rnk/dc"
res = GET(url)
res_json = content(res)
raw = (data.frame(do.call(rbind,res_json$prods)))
```

## My Results

```{r Table}
library(knitr)
kable(raw)
```
